Text:
Instructions:
This is an ascrypt_pro installer. You have to run the installer to the registration screen, then find the temp folder that contains ascrypt_pro and replace it with the one in this package. When the Aerosoft Launcher pop-up opens, force quit the installer, then add the .bgl files from this package into the appropriately named scenery folder within the Aerosoft directory. You can leave or delete the .blob files, FSX won't recognize them and they are only 5 mb. As an added measure, you can delete the Aerosoft Launcher within the Aerosoft directory, it is useless anyway.
